articles.description: With the film of the competition that used the game, ahem, now in cinemas, we spotted several vehicles in the movie not yet within the associated title.
articles.content:
Gran Turismo: Based On A True Story is the film biopic of Jann Mardenborough, who in 2011 won the GT Academy competition to go from PlayStation 3 player to Nissan Motorsports driver.
The movie relea… [+5564 chars]

articles.title: The New Day return to take out The Viking Raiders: Raw highlights, Aug. 7, 2023 - WWE
articles.description: The Viking Raiders offer an open challenge that is accepted by the returning New Day. Catch WWE action on Peacock, WWE Network, FOX, USA Network, Sony India ...
